metadata.title: CVE-2024-45598 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Cacti is an open source performance and fault management framework. Priorto 1.2.29, an administrator can change the `Poller Standard Error Log Path`parameter in either Installation Step 5 or inConfiguration->Settings->Paths tab to a local file inside the server. Thensimply going to Logs tab and selecting the name of the local file will showits content on the web UI. This vulnerability is fixed in 1.2.29.

criterions.comment: cacti package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
